activities:
While using the Hansa GCR website, the user may provide the company with personal information for registration, participation in a survey or webinar, or for us to contact them.  Registration of the user is required for some of the materials the user may want to download.  
We use the information we collect to:
•Assess the needs of the user’s business to determine suitable products
•Send the user requested product or service information
•Respond to customer service requests
•Send the user Hansa information materials and invitations to webinars from us and our affiliate companies
•Send the user marketing communications
•Respond to the user’s questions and concerns
•Improve our Web site and marketing efforts
•Conduct research and analysis
We do not sell, rent, provide access to, or otherwise disclose any personally identifiable information the user provides us to unaffiliated persons or organizations for commercial gain. There are only five circumstances under which we disclose personally identifiable information: 
1.We may use a third-party Web site technology service company for maintenance and enhancement of our Web site. 
2.We may provide personal information to companies that provide services to help us with our business activities such as offering surveys and webinar services. These companies are authorized to use personal information only as necessary to provide these services to us and are contractually obligated to keep information confidential.
3.We share personal information with our Sister Company Hansa Marketing Services in order to provide the user with access to our marketing communications and webinar invitations and registrations. 
4.We reserve the right to disclose personally identifiable information as required by law and when we believe that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect the user’s safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, and/or to comply with a judicial proceeding, subpoena court order, or legal process served on our company or Web site.

We will retain the information as needed to provide the user services and as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.  We provide the user the opportunity to opt-out of having personally identifiable information used for certain purposes, when we ask for this information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data = data collected directly on the Internet; Offline data = any digital data processed not through the Internet; Manually processed data = data collected manually
